title: Dispatches: Witnessing Nadezhda Savchenko’s Trial (HRW - Human Rights Watch)
text: ( Source : HRW - Human Rights Watch ) Nadezhda Savchenko sat on a bench in the glass defendant's cage, just a few steps away from her mother in a courtroom in southern Russia . 'Mom, how is our apple orchard? Was there a good harvest?' she
